body_html:
Could you report something like the output of memory_profiler?

Random stab at the problem:
I would expect system memory to explode once you empty gpu to cpu. Another is if feature_groups = logits['features'] is some large amount of data then feed_dict[feature_groups[n]] = feature_groups_[n] you'll slowly append things to the feed_dict

Random stab at the problem:
I would expect system memory to explode once you empty gpu to cpu. Another is if  feature_groups = logits['features'] is some large amount of data then feed_dict[feature_groups[n]] = feature_groups_[n] you'll slowly append things to the feed_dict
body:
Could you report something like the output of [memory_profiler](https://pypi.org/project/memory_profiler/)? 

Random stab at the problem:
I would expect system memory to explode once you empty gpu to cpu. Another is if  `feature_groups = logits['features']` is some large amount of data then `feed_dict[feature_groups[n]] = feature_groups_[n]` you'll slowly append things to the `feed_dict`
